title: Stereo Collect
description:
Stereo captures of SP Crater, Arizona. This collection was tasked for the [Cloud Native Geospatial Awards](https://medium.com/radiant-earth-insights/cloud-native-geospatial-sprint-awards-bounties-4f929727aa9c), selected by Robin Fergason. The 4 captures include [Basic L1A All Frames](https://assets.planet.com/docs/Planet_Basic_L1A_All-Frames_User_Guide.pdf) products to enable 3d reconstruction. 

*NOTE:* The captures right now only have Visual and L1A All Frames assets, they will eventually be updated to include analytic outputs.
